Hi Laurian,

>I embedded heritrix in tomcat, profile edit, job creation wor=
ks, but
>it does not resolve the seed:
>"Heritrix(-1)-Domain unresolvable S=
eed has not been processed"
>
>I have nothing on the logs.
>Runned standalo=
ne it works.
>-- 
>Laurian Gridinoc, purl.org/net/laur 

I'm sure others wi=
ll have some insight, but my first thought is that you
could be getting DNS=
 trouble if you haven't explicitly set the Heritrix
jar at the front of you=
r classpath. See last item on this page,
"Potential classpath issue"
http:/=
/crawler.archive.org/cgi-bin/wiki.pl?EmbeddingHeritrix -- I find I
have to =
edit Tomcat's bin/setclasspath.sh, and that once I've edited
that, the defa=
ult classpath goes all to pieces and I have to add every
jar that Tomcat wo=
uld ordinarily recognize on its own. Let us know if
that cures the problem.=


Incidentally, which version are you using? 

Shifra

	Hello,
	
	I embedded heritrix in tomcat, profile =
edit, job creation works,
but
	it does not resolve the seed:
	"Heritrix(-1)=
-Domain unresolvable Seed has not been processed"
	
	I have nothing on the =
logs.
	Runned standalone it works.
	
	Any clue where to look?
